steps.name: Investor Discovery & Scoring
steps.details: Analyzed 247 investor profiles, calculated fit scores, identified top 15 matches

steps.name: Warm Connection Pathfinding
steps.details: Mapped LinkedIn connections, identified 8 warm intro paths with 70%+ success probability

steps.name: Prioritize Top 5 Investors
steps.details: Ranked investors by combined fit score, warm intro availability, and response probability

steps.name: Generate Introduction Drafts
steps.details: Created personalized introduction emails for each investor, tailored to their portfolio and investment thesis

steps.name: Human Review & Approval
steps.details: Human reviewed all introduction drafts, approved 4 with minor edits, requested revision for 1
steps.humanFeedback: Excellent personalization. Strengthen the mutual connection context for Marcus.

steps.name: Execute Warm Introductions
steps.details: Sent 3 warm introductions via identified connectors, initiated tracking for responses

steps.name: Response Monitoring & Analysis
steps.details: Monitored email engagement, analyzed response patterns, received 2 positive responses within 24 hours

steps.name: Meeting Coordination
steps.details: Coordinated calendars, proposed meeting times, confirmed 2 investor meetings

steps.name: Meeting Preparation & Materials
steps.details: Preparing investor-specific materials, research briefs, and talking points for upcoming meetings

steps.name: Execute Investor Meetings
steps.details: Attend scheduled investor meetings with AI-prepared materials and talking points

steps.name: Post-Meeting Follow-up
steps.details: Analyze meeting outcomes, send follow-up materials, manage next steps

steps.name: Coalition Completion & Handoff
steps.details: Complete coalition building process, generate final report, transition to due diligence phase

steps.name: Financial Model Preparation
steps.details: Prepare comprehensive financial models and projections for investor review

steps.name: Customer Reference Coordination
steps.details: Contact key customers, coordinate reference calls, prepare case studies

steps.name: Technical Documentation
steps.details: Compile technical architecture, security documentation, and scalability plans

steps.name: Legal Document Preparation
steps.details: Work with legal team to prepare corporate documents and cap table

steps.name: Management Presentations
steps.details: Prepare detailed presentations for management team meetings

steps.name: Data Room Setup
steps.details: Organize and upload all documents to secure data room

steps.name: Background Checks & Compliance
steps.details: Coordinate background checks and ensure regulatory compliance

steps.name: Final Review & Launch
steps.details: Final review of all materials before starting due diligence process
